text: Phir humne is kitaab ka waris bana diya un logon ko jinhein humne (is virasat ke liye) apne bandon mein se chun liya. Ab koi to inmein se apne nafs par zulm karne wala hai, aur koi beach ki raas hai (medium course), aur koi Allah ke izan se nekiyon mein sabaqat karne wala (aagey badne wala) hai, yahi bahut bada fazal hai
